text: Meemaa ga diiagi tahi buini hagaloohi, ga nomuli ga diiagi di lua buini hagaloohi, ga nomuli meemaa gaa dau adu gi di ngudu di bontai baalanga dela e huudonu gi di waahale, gei di bontai deelaa ga mahuge hua i deia ang gi meemaa. Meemaa ga ulu gi daha, ga taele i hongo di ala, gei di madagoaa hua deelaa, tangada di langi gaa ngala gi daha mo Peter.
